00015 #include "userlevelmeter.h"

00017 
00018 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, ILM, "Oxford ILM Helium Level Meter");
00019 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, LM500, "LakeShore LM-500 Level Meter");
00020 
00021 XILM::XILM(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XOxfordDriver<XLevelMeter>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00027 {
00028     const char *channels_create[] = {"He", 0L};
00029     createChannels(scalarentries, channels_create);
00030 }
00031 
00032 double
00033 XILM::getLevel(unsigned int ch)
00034 {
00035     return read(ch + 1) / 10.0;
00036 }
00037 
00038 XLM500::XLM500(const char *name, bool runtime,
00039                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00040                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00041                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00042                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00043     XCharDeviceDriver<XLevelMeter>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00044 {
00045     const char *channels_create[] = {"1", "2", 0L};
00046     createChannels(scalarentries, channels_create);
00047 
00048     interface()->setEOS("");
00049     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00050     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead (false);
00051     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(40);
00052     //    ExclusiveWaitAfterWrite = 10;
00053     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(40);     
00054 }
00055 
00056 double
00057 XLM500::getLevel(unsigned int ch)
00058 {
00059     interface()->queryf("MEAS? %u", ch + 1);
00060     return interface()->toDouble();
00061 }
